import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Login.css';// Import external CSS
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/users/login',{email,password});toast.success('Login successful!',{position:"top-center"});localStorage.setItem('token',res.data.token);localStorage.setItem('username',res.data.username);localStorage.setItem('role',res.data.role);if(res.data.role==='admin'){navigate('/admin');}else{navigate('/courses');}}catch(error){var _error$response;console.error(error);toast.error(((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.data)||'Login failed!',{position:"top-center"});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"login-title",children:"\uD83D\uDD10 Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",required:true,value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),className:"login-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",required:true,value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"login-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"login-button",children:"Login"})]})});};export default Login;
